page.title: 12 STEEL HOUSE
page.content: STEEL HOUSE is situated off the Trunk Road,Redcar,Cleveland.It was built in 1977 at a cost of Â£10-11 million.It is a modern design and the building covers 2 acres.It stands 100 feet high and there are 5 floors.624 peole work in the building.50% are men,50% are women.They work flexi time hours,but have a set amount each week.In STEEL HOUSE there are 10 main departments,but each department has several little departments.Facilities include a Bank,Shop,Canteen and Medical Centre.STEEL HOUSE deals with most Cleveland and some other works to.In STEEL HOUSE there are over 1 million different computers.Securaty is very good in and out of STEEL HOUSE.There are 2 guards always in the building.This is only a small part of the security system.This particular branch of B.S.C.was founded by D.LONG.
